name: Titanium.Contacts.Person
summary: An object that represents a contact record for a person or organization in the system contacts address book.

properties.name: address
properties.summary: Addresses for the person. Multi-value. Read-only on Android.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of home, work, and/or other.
  • Values: arrays of dictionary types with seven keys, CountryCode, Street, City, , State, Country and PostalCode, each with a string type value.

On Android:

'CountryCode' and 'County' are currently not supported.

On iOS:

The CountryCode key value may be one of the recognized two-character ISO 3166-1 country codes, and determines the format in which the contact is presented by the address book user interface. See the wikipedia section ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 for a comprehensive list of codes.

properties.name: alternateBirthday
properties.summary: Alternate birthday of the person. Single Dictionary.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: calendarIdentifier, era, year, month, day and isLeapMonth.
  • Values: Use chinese, hebrew and islamic-civil for calendarIdentifier. Use number type for era, year, month and day. These must be consistent with corresponding calendarIdentifier. Use boolean type for isLeapMonth.

properties.name: birthday
properties.summary: Date of birth of the person. Single value.

properties.name: created
properties.summary: Date and time that the person record was created. Single value. Deprecated since iOS 9.

properties.name: date
properties.summary: Dates associated with the person. Multi-value.
properties.description:
Adding or modifying this property is not currently supported.

The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of anniversary and/or other.
  • Values: array of string type.

Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS+0000"

properties.name: department
properties.summary: Department of the person. Single value.

properties.name: email
properties.summary: Email addresses for the person. Multi-value. Read-only on Android.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of home, work, and/or other.
  • Values: array of string type.

properties.name: firstName
properties.summary: First name of the person. Single value.

properties.name: firstPhonetic
properties.summary: Phonetic first name of the person. Single value.

properties.name: fullName
properties.summary: Localized full name of the person. Single value. Read-only on Android.
properties.description: The full name will be printed in the order of. Prefix,first name, middle name, family name, suffix.

properties.name: id
properties.summary: Record identifier of the person. Single value.

properties.name: identifier
properties.summary: Identifier of the person.

properties.name: image
properties.summary: Image for the person. Single value. Read-only for >= iOS9

properties.name: instantMessage
properties.summary: Instant messenger information of the person. Multi-value.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of home, work and/or other.
  • Values: arrays of dictionary types with two keys, service and username, each with a string type value.

The service key value may be one of AIM, Facebook, GaduGadu, GoogleTalk, ICQ, Jabber, MSN, QQ, Skype, or Yahoo. These values are key sensitive.

properties.name: jobTitle
properties.summary: Job title of the person. Single value.

properties.name: kind
properties.summary: Determines the type of information the person record contains; either person or organization. Read-only on Android.

properties.name: lastName
properties.summary: Last name of the person. Single value.

properties.name: lastPhonetic
properties.summary: Phonetic last name of the person. Single value.

properties.name: middleName
properties.summary: Middle name of the person. Single value.

properties.name: middlePhonetic
properties.summary: Phonetic middle name of the person. Single value.

properties.name: modified
properties.summary: Date and time that the person record was last modified. Single value. Deprecated since iOS 9.

properties.name: nickname
properties.summary: Nickname of the person. Single value.

properties.name: note
properties.summary: Notes for the person. Single value.

properties.name: organization
properties.summary: Organization to which the person belongs. Single value.

properties.name: phone
properties.summary: Phone numbers for the person. Multi-value. Read-only on Android.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of home, work, other, mobile, pager, workFax, homeFax, main, and/or iPhone.
  • Values: array of string type.

properties.name: prefix
properties.summary: Prefix for the person. Single value.

properties.name: recordId
properties.summary: Record identifier of the person. Single value. Deprecated since iOS 9.
properties.description: For iOS 9 and later, use the identifier property. Previously, a contact can be selected without requiring User permission. In such case this property returns -1.

properties.name: relatedNames
properties.summary: Names of people to which the person is related. Multi-value.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of mother, father, parent, brother, sister, child, friend, spouse, partner, assistant, manager, and/or other.
  • Values: array of string type.

properties.name: socialProfile
properties.summary: Social profile information of the person. Multi-value.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of home, work and/or other.
  • Values: arrays of dictionary types with two keys, service and username each with a string type value.

The service key value may be one of twitter, sinaweibo, gamecenter, facebook, myspace, linkedin, or flickr. These values are key sensitive.

properties.name: suffix
properties.summary: Suffix for the person. Single value.

properties.name: url
properties.summary: URLs of webpages associated with the person. Multi-value.
properties.description:
The format of the dictionary accepted by this property is as follows:

  • Keys: any of homepage, home, work, and/or other.
  • Values: array of string type.
